text: Veruyushchiye! Da ne osmeivayut muzhchiny muzhchin: mozhet byt', eti luchshe tekh; ni zhenshchiny - zhenshchin: mozhet byt', eti luchshe tekh. Ne besslav'te sebya samikh: ne davayte drug drugu unizitel'nykh prozvishch. Posle uverovaniya kak neprilichno gnusnoye imya! I te, kotoryye yeshche ne odumalis', - te nechestivy
